00019   typedef enum RewardType {
00020     RT_LocalReward,     // Throughput of the controller intersection in the last step duration   
00021     RT_MixedReward,     // Same as above plus neighbour throughput and global throughput ( first is x100 second x10 and last x1 in importance )
00022     RT_PowerLocalReward // It's the local reward multiplied by 100
00023   };
